Name: Infernal Parade
Effect: Single Target. Roll 2 Chance Dice to inflict 2nd Degree Burn on the Foe. *If the Target has an active Status Condition, add 2 Extra Dice to te Damage Pool of this Move.
Description: 'You may not be the type to faint when things are odd or things are quaint. But seeing flames you know that ain't will scorch you into dismay.'
